title: Dodge Penalty needs be higher i reckon (for ranked)
body: Guys since the start of season 6 lots of people have accidentally dodged champ select because they forgot to lock in but now its happening way less. the thing is that champ select and que times are both a bit longer than season which i don't mind since the dynamic and role picking ability has increased the quality of ranked system. However with this new dynamic people i haven't seen a single champ select troll yet unlike solo Que which every fourth champ select you would get teemo jg lock in; so because of this players are careless with their dodges and use them on every possible scenario. (e.g they feel like their team comp is a bit weaker or they didn't get the exact champ or role they wanted). i was wondering to know whats your opinion on this cause i just had 4 champ select dodges in row and I'm still in que

replies.body:
I see a distinct trade off between having low and high penalties for first time dodges.

* When the penalty is low players will dodge because of little things. The thing you lose is time.
* When the penalty is high people feel trapped in games they don't want to play. Depending on how hard they take it (or if they troll) you may lose the game and your time.

Personally, I'd rather just wait then have to play with someone who doesn't want to play at all.

Have a bit of patience as dodging is part of the strategy to maintain winnings. Guys who play every game ends up losing more then winning as the odds in dynamic queue is in favours of that. Wait till they have pure solo queue then less people will dodge.

Dodging ranked champ select is treated pretty harshly already.

>* You lost 3LP for the first offence of the day, coming up to 10LP for subsequent dodges.
* 6 minute queue penatly for first dodge, any more lands you in a 30 miniute one.
* Dodging in a series counts as a loss
[
 (Taken from the queue dodge FAQ)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging)

When I get in champ select (in the very rare case where I am not 5man premade), I usually remind people to lock in their picks and bans. Most people will also be frustrated with the number of times they have had a dodge wasting their time and will echo your sentiments.
